summary: A master monk tries to protect a naive young physician from a thousand-year-old snake demon. A contest of psychic powers results in mayhem.
cast: Jet Li|Shengyi Huang|Raymond Lam|Charlene Choi|Zhang Wen|Vivian Hsu|Miriam Chin Wah Yeung|Kar-Ying Law|Suet Lam|Chapman To|Wu Jiang|Hailong Bai|Soi Cheang|Ran Chen|Tat-Ming Cheung|Ziyuan Fang|Hai Bo Gao|Dong Han|Jie Hong|Rui Hu|Qianqian Kong|Dan Li|En Qian Li|Man Man Li|Cai-Rang Ning-Ge|Wenjia Song|Angela Ying-Ying Tong|Michelle Wai|Jiayin Wang|Shengli Wang|Lu Wei|Ning Xu|Youchen Yin|Wenjun Zhang|Siwen Zhao|Ye Zi|Alfred Hsing|Sonija Kwok
title: Bai she chuan shuo
